Kashira:
Oniwaka (鬼若)

Category: Male

– Click image to view.

Plays:

The Battle of Sakamoto Castle (Ōmi Genji senjin yakata / 近江源氏先陣館)

The Twenty-Four Dutiful Sons (Honchō nijūshikō / 本朝廿四孝)

Sugawara's Secrets of Calligraphy (Sugawara denju tenarai kagami / 菅原伝授手習鑑)

The Nunobiki Waterfall (Genpei Nunobiki no taki / 源平布引滝)

The Teachings for Women (Imoseyama onna teikin / 妹背山婦女庭訓)

The Old Tale of Kusunoki (Kusunoki mukashibanashi / 楠昔噺)

The Gion Festival (Gion sairei shinkōki / 祇園祭礼信仰記)

The Tycoon's Exploit (Ehon taikōki / 絵本太功記 絵本太功記)

The Adachi Plain in Oshu (Ōshu Adachigahara / 奥州安達原)

The Crossroads of Gappo (Sesshū Gappō ga Tsuji / 摂州合邦辻)

The Vow of Rokusuke (Hikosan gongen chikai no sukedachi / 彦山権現誓助剣)

The Maple Viewing Party (Momijigari / 紅葉狩)

The White Fox of Shinoda (Ashiya Dōman ōuchi kagami / 芦屋道満大内鑑)

The Two Butterflies (Futatsu chōchō kuruwa nikki / 双蝶々曲輪日記)

The Imprisoned Warrior (Shusse Kagekiyo / 出世景清)

Kajiwara The Swordsman (Miura no Ōsuke kōbai Tazuna / 三浦大助紅梅たづな)

The Priest in Exile (Heike nyōgo no shima / 平家女護島)

Mt. Oeyama (Ōeyama shutendōji / 大江山酒呑童子)

The Battles of Genji and Heike (Hiragana seisuiki / ひらかな盛衰記)

The Feudal Lord in Asama (Asama no tonosama / 浅間の殿様)

Subjugation of Ogres on Mt. Oe (Ōeyama no onitaiji / 大江山の鬼退治)

The Herculean Woman (Wada kassen onna maizuru / 和田合戦女舞鶴)

Kiichi's Book of Strategy (Kiichi Hōgen sanryaku no maki / 鬼一法眼三略巻)
